dunes-script-module.name: updateVCACEntity
dunes-script-module.description: Updates a vCloud Automation Center model entity by its ID.
dunes-script-module.param: The vCloud Automation Center's model name of the vCloud Automation Center entity.
The entity set of the vCloud Automation Center entity.
A map of property name, value containing the ID of the vCloud Automation Center's entity.
A map of the HTTP headers.
dunes-script-module.script: return vCACEntityManager.updateModelEntityBySerializedKey(hostId, modelName, entitySetName, entityIdString, properties, links, headers);
